What are the treatments for Fecal Incontinence ?,"Treatment for fecal incontinence may include one or more of the following:
                
- eating, diet, and nutrition  - medications  - bowel training  - pelvic floor exercises and biofeedback  - surgery  - electrical stimulation",NIDDK,Fecal Incontinence
